blogPost.title: What was it like to have your company acquired? Answer by Miro Pavletic, Head of Global Banking, @creditsesame. https://t.co/6c2m3XxcQA https://t.co/c7c38W6Wb1
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 贵公司被收购是什么感觉？由@creditsesame全球银行业务负责人Miro Pavletic回答。https://t.co/6c2m3XxcQA https://t.co/c7c38W6Wb1。

previous.title: What was it like to immigrate to the US by yourself at such a young age? Answer by Yong Kim, CEO and Cofounder @Wonolo. https://t.co/6q6b6NgCGc https://t.co/C2bsuj11mP
